para.link: Freeze Unfreeze Peripherals in Debug mode

listitem.para: Freeze/Unfreeze Peripherals in Debug mode Note: On devices STM32F10xx8 and STM32F10xxB, STM32F101xC/D/E and STM32F103xC/D/E, STM32F101xF/G and STM32F103xF/G STM32F10xx4 and STM32F10xx6 Debug registers DBGMCU_IDCODE and DBGMCU_CR are accessible only in debug mode (not accessible by the user software in normal mode). Refer to errata sheet of these devices for more details.
